categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: The brother of Talos Drellik was a male Human Sith of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War; he was personally selected by the Dark Councilor Darth Marr to enter the Korriban Sith Academy, losing all contact with his family. This greatly irritated his father, as well as his brother, Talos.
